/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades painted in a palette of mostly beige and gray, punctuated by occasional splashes of red and green. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds adding depth to the scene. In the distance, a tall building stands out, its height dwarfing the surrounding structures. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the grandeur of the buildings and the vastness of the sky.
